landing.unique_features_content: Providing a trustworthy and transparent decentralized insurance service, mitigating the risk of users' asset value loss resulting from market fluctuations with many unique attributes.
landing.asset_value_content: Nami Insurance offers asset value insurance, mitigating user losses prior to market uncertainty.
landing.insurance_options_content: Users can choose from many insurance plans, based on actual needs with the main indicators of each insurance contract such as: Margin Value, Cover Price , Cover Period, Cover Margin Unit for insurance...
landing.multi_asset_content: Nami Insurance's product is available for most common assets, held by many users such as BTC, ETH, BNB...
landing.stay_up_to_date_content: Get updates on all of our events and be the first to get notified when new products launch
landing.register_content: The lasted information will be sent to you. Please check email regularly
landing.email_invalid: Confirmation email invalid. Please try again.
